string.text: (Default true) The culture will gradually switch to the new culture
(Default 45) Resistance factor for change in culture. Higher resistance slows down the rate of change
(Default 5) Extra influence for the owner of the settlement
(Default 30) Geographical range to check for influence from surrounding settlements
(Default true) Settlements linked by peasant trade will influence each other
(Default false) Only the Player's kingdom's settlements will change culture
(Default true) When a settlement change culture activating this will change the culture of Notable (It will affect recruit/volunteer type).

(Default 0 (The governor culture doesn't influence the settlement culture)) Allow the governor culture to influence the culture of the settlement it's assigned to. If you want to change city culture to the one of your governor you probably want a high value (30 to max) if the settlement is surround by settlements with the same culture (if you have high owner influence it might conflict)
(Default true) Governor culture will only affect player settlement
(Default true) Show influences in details by pressing Alt key, setting this option to false will show influence in main tooltip (without pressing Alt)
